node1.PC_Text: It's like we just saw each other yesterday. Speaking of…have you been keeping up with The Bachelor?
node1.NPC_Response: No, I was busy! How was it?

node1.PC_Text: I know I just started here but I think the IT guy is interested in me!
node1.NPC_Response: I think he was just being nice to you.

node1.PC_Text: Since we are both new here, do you want to help me set up a speed dating night with our new coworkers?
node1.NPC_Response: I don’t think that would be appropriate at our new job.
